field.label: Title
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: DOI
field.hint: DOI (Digital Object Identifier) of the publication, if any. The main data of the publication will be autocompleted automatically, according to the source.

field.label: Scopus EID
field.hint: ID of the publication in Scopus, i.e. the EID of the publication, if any. The main data of the publication will be autocompleted automatically, according to the source.

field.label: PubMed ID
field.hint: Publication ID in PubMed, if available. The main data of the publication will be autocompleted automatically, according to the source.

field.label: ISI number
field.hint: Web of Science publication ID (WOS ID), if available. The main data of the publication will be autocompleted automatically, according to the source.

field.label: ISBN
field.hint: Register the publication's own ISBN. Do not use it for chapters of a book or journal articles in which the publication is contained. publication is contained, use the field "ISBN of the container" for this.

field.label: Handle or URL
field.hint: Enter a URL if the publication does not have a persistent identifier (Handle, DOI, ISBN, ISSN, PubMed, ISI-Number, SCP-Number).

field.label: ARK identifier
field.hint: Ark id of the publication or product, if available

field.label: Product Version
field.hint: Example: 2.0

field.label: Title
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.

field.label: Publication id in source system
field.hint: Internal code of the publication in the source system

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: Record other (parallel or alternative) titles. To do so, use this field recursively.

field.label: Resource type
field.required: You must select a resource type
field.hint: Example: Artculo de revista cientfica.

field.label: Open Access (OA) level
field.required: You must select an Open Access level
field.hint: Information on the rights or means of access to the content of this publication

field.label: Open Access (OA) embargo end date
field.hint: The end of embargo date is considered to be the date when the publication is has as its open access level: Embargoed

field.label: Date of publication
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.

field.label: Start Page
field.hint: If applicable, the page where this publication starts

field.label: End Page
field.hint: If applicable, the page where this publication ends

field.label: Edition
field.hint: The edition number of this publication. For example: 2nd edition of a book

field.label: Number
field.hint: If applicable, the number of the publication channel in which this publication appeared. For example, the number of the journal in which an article was published.

field.label: Volume
field.hint: The volume of this publication, normally one issue. For example: the volume of a journal.

field.label: Issue
field.hint: The number of the issue in which this publication appeared. For for example, the issue of the journal in which an article was published.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Provide a textual description of the content. Consider first the original language and then the language(s) in which it is available. available.

field.hint: Example: licencia de acceso abierto Creative Commons.

field.label: Source
field.hint: The source (another publication) where this publication appeared. For example: a journal article lists here the journal where it appeared.

field.label: ISSN
field.hint: The ISSN of the journal containing this publication.

field.label: Resource of which it is part
field.hint: The publication of which it is a part. For example: a book chapter lists here the book that contains it. To be used for a containing publication.

field.label: ISBN (of the container)
field.hint: The ISBN of the book/report if it was not found in the system

field.label: DOI (of the container)
field.hint: The DOI of the object containing this publication.

field.label: Conference
field.hint: Conference of which this publication is part.

field.label: Dataset
field.hint: Link the publication to one or more datasets.

field.label: Funded by
field.hint: Acknowledge the funding received for this publication.

field.label: Originated by the project
field.hint: The project from which this publication originates.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Provide the name of the sponsors, as well as the programme or financial scheme, and the number given to the grant whenever possible. Example: NATIONAL COUNCIL FOR SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY CONCYTEC

field.label: Title of the patent
field.required: You must specify a title for the patent
field.hint: The title of the patent

field.label: Patent id in source system
field.hint: Internal code of the patent in the source system

field.label: Other titles of the patent
field.hint: Repeat the field as many times as necessary in the following cases: (1) if the patent has more than one official title, (2) if the patent includes an official title in a language other than Spanish, (3) if the title is in a non-Latin alphabet, use to clarify the name in the Spanish language. Non-official translations of the title are not allowed.

field.label: Patent Number
field.hint: Enter the full patent number as it appears in the supporting documents (dossier).

field.label: Resource Type
field.required: You must select a patent type

field.label: ONPI International patent classification (CIP)
field.required: You must enter ONPI International patent classification (CIP)

field.label: Grantor
field.hint: The entity granting this patent: the patent office.

field.label: Date of submission of original application
Date of grant or approval
field.hint: Date of making available to the public by printing or similar process of a patent document granted on or before that date. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the description of the patent.

field.label: Keyword(s)
field.hint: Enter keywords, separated by comma ,

field.label: Source Funding
field.hint: The funding that originates this patent.

field.label: Project of origin
field.hint: The project from which this patent originates. For example: Project COVID-19

field.label: Predecessor
field.hint: Patents that precede (i.e. have priority) over this patent.

field.label: Organization name
field.required: You must enter the organization name.
field.hint: It applies to parent Organizational Units and their dependencies (faculties, departments, units, areas, among others that carry out R + D and activities within the institution), as well as research groups and institutional research lines.

field.required: You must enter the organization type.

field.label: Parent Organisation
field.hint: The name of the immediately superior organizational unit that encompasses this agency, subunit, research group, or institutional research line.

field.label: Sector Institutional (Mandatory only for main institutions)
Email
field.hint: Email associated with the organizational unit or its dependencies. Institutional email must be registered.

field.label: Contact Person
field.hint: Register the contact person for matters related to your organisation's participation in project activities.

field.label: Funding Entity
field.required: You must specify Funding Entity
field.hint: The entity that has financed the project.

field.label: Funding Name
field.hint: Name of the funding (grant, award, contract) from which the project originates.

field.label: Project title
field.required: You must enter the project name.

field.label: Project id in source system
field.hint: Internal code of the project in source system

field.label: Project other title(s)
field.hint: Repeat the field as many times as necessary in the following cases: (1) if the project has more than one official name, (2) if the project includes an official name in a language other than Spanish, (3) if the name is found in non-Latin alphabet, use to clarify the name in Spanish. Non-official translations to the title are not allowed.

field.label: Project Acronym
field.hint: Acronym or abbreviated form of the name

field.label: Internal project ID
field.required: Please enter an Internal project ID
field.hint: Code with which it is referred to in publications and other documents. Example: 048-2020-FONDECYT-BM-AC

field.label: Project URL
field.hint: Example: https://www.ins.gob.pe/prisa/ver_investigacion.aspx?36AAFBEE-9954-403E-AFEE-FE45AB7F93F9

field.label: Keyword(s)
field.hint: Insert one or many comma keywords separated by ,

field.label: Main Executing Organization (Contractor)
field.hint: Institution, consortium directly responsible for the project, according to the contract or corresponding project document.

field.label: Main Executing Person (Contractor)
field.hint: Person directly responsible for the project, according to the contract or corresponding project document.

field.label: General Coordinator(s)
field.hint: The person(s) coordinating the administration of the project.

field.label: Partner organisation with monetary contribution (Partner)
field.hint: Partner organisation with a monetary contribution that contributes to the realisation of the project

field.label: Partner person with monetary contribution (Partner)
field.hint: Partner person with a monetary contribution that contributes to the realisation of the project

field.label: Non-monetary partner organisation (InkindContributor)
field.hint: Non-monetary partner organisation that contributes to the realisation of the project.

field.label: Non-monetary contributor (InkindContributor)
field.hint: Non-monetary partner person that contributes to the realisation of the project.

field.label: Consortium Member(s)
field.hint: In case of consortium, enter here the organisations that are members of the consortium

field.label: Person member of consortium (Member)
field.hint: In case of a consortium, enter here the persons who are members of the consortium.

field.label: Principal investigator or innovator
field.required: You must enter Principal investigator or innovator
field.hint: The person responsible for the project activities, the head of the project team.

field.label: Contact person
field.hint: Register the contact person for matters related to your organisation's participation in project activities.

field.label: Other team members
field.hint: Other team members

field.label: Institutional research line
field.hint: The institutionally approved or declared line of research.

field.label: Project Geolocation(s)
field.hint: The geographical area (spatial region or place name) in which the field study is conducted or the project is implemented.

field.label: Open Access Mandate (OA)
field.required: Please select Open Access Mandate
field.hint: Information on whether this project has an Open Access mandate that applies to the publications and/or research data derived from it.

field.label: Open Access Mandate URL (OA)
field.hint: URL of the institutional policy or other document that specifies in which cases and under which conditions the Open Access mandate applies to this project, according to Law 30035.

field.required: You must enter the equipment name.

field.label: Equipment id in source system
field.hint: Internal code of the equipment in the source system

field.label: Other equipment names
field.hint: Repeat the field as many times as necessary in the following cases: (1) if the equipment has more than one name, (2) if the equipment includes a name in a language other than Spanish, (3) if the name is in non-Latin alphabet, use to clarify the name in Spanish language. No unofficial translations of the name are allowed.

field.label: Acronym
field.hint: Acronym or abbreviated form of the equipment.

field.required: You must enter the institution equipment code

field.label: Organisational unit owning the equipment
field.required: You must enter the organizational unit owning the equipment
field.hint: If possible, consider the most specific organisational unit or sub-unit. Example: Advanced Physics Laboratory.

field.label: Equipment Type
field.required: Please select Equipment Type

field.label: Purchasing amount
field.hint: Consider integer numbers without decimals or separators. Example: 150000

field.label: Description
field.hint: Consider the make, series and model of the equipment, contact details and other equipment features.

field.hint: The institutionally approved or declared line of research.
